R3.description: A flavorful, easy-to-make vegetable fried rice cooked with eggs, butter, and soy sauce — a perfect homemade Asian-style meal.

instructions.title: Get Your Ingredients
actions: Gather all ingredients listed: 1 1/2 cups uncooked rice, 2 eggs, 1/2 carrot, 1/2 green pepper, 6 mushrooms, 3 green onions, 1/2 zucchini, 2 tablespoons butter, 1/4 cup soy sauce, and 2 to 3 cups water.

instructions.title: Prepare Your Rice and Vegetables
actions: Cook 1 1/2 cups rice according to package directions using 2–3 cups water depending on rice type.
Bring water to a boil, add rice, stir for 30 seconds, remove from heat, and cover until cooked.
Hint: Use a rice cooker if available.
Chop 1/2 green pepper, 3 green onions, 6 mushrooms, and 1/2 zucchini into 1/4-inch pieces.

instructions.title: Prepare Eggs
actions: Scramble 2 eggs in a separate pan until cooked through.

instructions.title: Grill Vegetables and Eggs
actions: Place vegetables, 1 tablespoon butter, and scrambled eggs in a wok or large pan.
Grill for 5 minutes over medium-high heat, stirring constantly.

instructions.title: Fry Rice
actions: Add cooked rice to the wok with vegetables and eggs.
Add remaining 1 tablespoon butter and mix.
Cook for 5 minutes over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally.

instructions.title: Stir in Soy Sauce
actions: Add 1/4 cup soy sauce to the fried rice and stir until evenly mixed.

instructions.title: Serve Yourselves
actions: Hint: Offer extra soy sauce for those who prefer more flavor.
